sentences: She published her first single in 1979 Bobista (now spelt as Bubista in Boa Vista Creole) by the label Discos Monte Cara by Bana.
She published her first single in 1979 Bobista (now spelt as Bubista in Boa Vista Creole) by the label Discos Monte Cara by Bana.
In 1986, she recorded her first album Força di Cretcheu (Força do Meu Amor) and was arranged by the music director Paulino Vieira and includes stories of nursery rhymes, plays and work.
In 1990, she released the LP Estória, Estória...
She started worked to tell stories in the United States in 1991.
She published the album Nós Tradição (Our Tradition) along with the French publisher Melódie in 1993.
The disc Harpejos e Gorjejos was published in 1998 and sang in Portuguese and Creole.
She worked with Martinho da Vila  on the song "Nutridinha (nutridinha do sal)" on the Lusofonia disc in 2000.
She was awarded the medal of merit - commemorative degree - by the Portuguese president Jorge Sampaio in 2003, for her work and area in education of Cape Verdean culture.
Pereira celebrated the Career Award in Concert about B. Leza in 2014.

do tambor a Blimundo vol.2 (audiobook, Tabanka Onlus, 2004)
